name: Dark Dreams (ʀᴏʙʙʏᴛᴇ)
description:
Simple game made with love by robbyte , an 15y old brazilian indie dev in 5 days =)

Dark Dreams, Fight the chaos inside your mind 

--
Important:
While in game, if you stay a long time out of the light range, you fear bar (purple bar) will increase, if it reaches max you will take damage until get to the light again

Controls:

MLeft- General interaction
F- Drop/Catch the light

WASD -  Move
Shift- Dash

MLeft- For Attack

--

Musics: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCr3D54lk90oa-ZN9-a1mv1Q/featured
